system.availability:
Can be used with Ready Action, If used by Necron, for 1d10+5 Rounds Necron increases Unnatural Toughness by +4 and Automatically passes Regeneration Tests.
If Used by Non-Necron suffer 2d10 Rending Damage not reduced by Armour or Toughness. If having Machine Trat(3+), instead remove 1d10 Damage and 1d10 Corruption.
system.cost:
Used by Necron Nobility. One Use Item.
Always Best Quality. Xenotech.
